dict.string: $(PRODUCT_NAME) requires access to the photo library to allow users to get photos of documents for identity verification (KYC) purposes. Additionally, the photos can optionally be used to capture profile photos to personalize the user experience.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) requires access to the camera to allow users to take photos of documents for identity verification (KYC) purposes. Additionally, the camera can optionally be used to capture profile photos to personalize the user experience.
